name: UX Flat
author: TienCOP

sections.description:
❤ This plugin will create new elements for Flatsome. Awesome !!! Minimum required Flatsome v3.19.2

LOADER IMAGE

✅ Site Loader overlay when loading the site

TYPING ANIMATION

✅ Change the search multiple field placeholder

[UXF ELEMENTS] PRE-DESIGNED TEMPLATES

✅ Section / Banner / Title / Button / Gallery / Slider / Image / Blog Posts / Portfolio / Google Maps
✅ Blog Categories / More / Menu / Icon / Lightbox / Table / Module

FL ICONS

✅ Enable customize icons

BACK TO TOP

✅ Custom Background & Icon back to top

BLOG GLOBAL

✅ Remove Category Archives Title

PERFORMANCE

✅ Blog Categories
✅ CDN jsDelivr

and more…
sections.installation:
You can install the UX Flat from your WordPress Dashboard or manually via FTP.

From WordPress Dashboard

  1. Navigate to ‘Plugins -> Add New’ from your WordPress dashboard.
  2. Search for UX Flat and install it.
  3. Activate the plugin from Plugins menu.
  4. Configure the plugin’s settings

Manual Installation

  1. Download the plugin file: ux-flat.zip
  2. Unzip the file
  3. Upload theux-flat.zip folder to your /wp-content/plugins directory (do not rename the folder)
  4. Activate the plugin from Plugins menu.
  5. Configure the plugin’s settings
